Separation Reason - Employee: Dear Sandeep Sir/Pooja madam, Forcefully iam submitting my resignation, without any particular reason Mr,Manoj DGM forced me to submit resignation and Behaving to me very rudely and insulting me in front of distributors and in whatsapp group massages also. He  showing only one reason is that business is not coming in parlor and saloons, they only informed me to that handle w/sale market and total territory and also I have achieved target not only my indiuval & also achieved total state targets, now Mr,Manoj telling that other reasons like Iam doing business only in wholesale market and he is asking my resignation forcefully. I feel proud Such a great company Hygienic research institute pvt ltd (Streax professional)where I worked. But my  eyes are opened, some of the DGM’s and managers misusing ethics & Standards of organization and He have such a great experience in this organization he spoiling all ethics and goodwill of Streax organization, infiltration creatingHe is telling every Managers and HO im wrong person And his abusing language infront of others in market those who are not related our business on me. BY THIS WORST POLITICS AS SUFFERING MENTALLY IN PROFEISSIONALLY AS WELL AS PERSONAL LIFE ALSO, Mr,Pramendra SIR & Jai Prakash Sir very professional doing work they supported a lot me in developing businessIn this condition im excepting positive response from the HRIm ready to facing any kind of challenges in target contribution to the companyMy performance 2015 to  till dateWhen I joined in this company every month in Telangana 2 to 3 lacks sales were done, now it is reached 20 lacks,in this sales my contribution would be 60% to 70% and I conducted 4 big seminars around 100 to 200 saloons and parlor attended, please find links seminar activity. Why iam mentioned my performance because some people in company  telling I didn’t do anything.STREAX PROFESSIONAL HAIR SHOW #streaxprosaminar#hyderabad#" on YouTubehttps://youtu.be/lwUUyt3mNAo NOV-2015 TO 2016MAR-2016 TO 2017MAR-2017 TO 2018MAR-2018 TO 2019MAR-2019 TO 2020MAR-2020 TO 2021MAR-2021 TO 2022Year TGT86380.5102.43150165196My ACH552.9371.73968134.2154.51TILL JC 7 My  Details:Iam B.Pramila working as BDO,Employee Code:Working from:09-09-2015 to till date Iam forcefully submitting my resignation today onwards .date 30th November 2021 , as per company norms my notice period will be 15 days.Iam submitting date of resignation :31-10-2021 my last working day will be date: 15th October 2021   EOD. THANK YOU FOR MANAGEMENT TO GIVE SUCH OPARCHUNRTY TO LEARN LOT THINGS IN DAY TO DAY IN JOBSSo Iam requesting to you that settle my all accounts ASAP, Please approve the same. Thanks & regards . B.Pramila.

Separation Reason - Employee: Dear Sir,         I,am Parshottam Dewangan, have been working in HRI pvt. Ltd. as a SR      HQ BHIALI CG.I am resigning from HRI pvt. Ltd. with effect from 22.12.2020 . In order to serve tha notice period I well be working till 05.01.2021 .It was a great learning experience working with Hygienic Research Institute pvt. Ltd. I learnt a lot from my seniors. there were plenty of opportunities provided by the senior team to me and I thoroughly enjoyed working with HRI pvt. Ltd. and team there was a lot which I learnt from my seniors as.      I would like to thanks my Seniors for providing me every single opportunity to learn what all I could. Moreover, I would like to thank for giving me encouragement in what all I did. further to this, I would like to thank my immediate colleague for his consistent support and teachings which will be helpful to me in my future. And last but, by any means not the least I would like to thanks my team, who was always there with me when I faced any problem.Cheers to HRI team and wishing them a very Happy and Bright Future. Thanks & Regards, PARSHOTTAM KUMAR DEWANGANSRHYGIENIC RESEARCH INSTITUTE Pvt.Ltd. BHILAI+91 9424107806
